comment: She is a tough grader. DO NOT TAKE HER!!

She is nice and makes the assignments enjoyable with creative, modern subject choices. Class is pretty pointless as she just reads off the textbook. Assignments are relatively easy and if you put in the work and follow the rubric you will get an A. Her “Owl-Allowance” system is very misleading and confusing, so get with her early to clarify it.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Her grading policy is not fair.

She is a great professor and actually connects with her students through 1 on 1 conferences. The essay rubric and grading is pretty strict, but if you follow instructions you can get perfect scores on all the rough draft (huge part of grade). Lastly, she gave our class 25 points on top of your final grade worth of extra credit assignments. Easy A

She is the toughest grader, assigning lots of homework and deducting half the points for small mistakes, which feels unfair. She offers essay rewrites but often doesn't reply to questions or accept them. Extra credit is assigned but not graded or included in final grades. Do not take her class. She will never teach you anything.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: Toughest grader I have ever had, don't take this class.
She has a weird attendance grading. She gives a lost of assignments and super strict about them. Don't take her class.
I don't think her grading fair!

I took her for 1101, and she is amazing—I highly recommend her! She makes the class very manageable. There were no tests, but we had to write 5 essays and complete discussion posts. Participation is important because she checks attendance weekly and includes it in your grade. Definitely TAKE HER CLASS!!!!

Three assignments made up 90% of the grade. She gave unclear feedback which made it hard to revise work. It felt as if my papers got worse after the rough draft from her feedback. Didn't feel like her grading was fair.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: She is the worst teacher in the word. She is super strict and grades unfairly.

Super sweet teacher. A lot of our classes were just fun discussions about social media and pop culture. There were times where the instructions for assignments were unclear, so be prepared to ask tons of clarifying questions. Overall, great teacher. If you're looking for a laid-back class, take this one.

(ENGL 1102 ONLY) TAKE HER because she was so nice and respectful. All you need to do on this class is TALK and LISTEN . So If you don't know how to write or what to write about on essays, SHE THE BEST OPTION TO TAKE.(BTW reason why I drop out is just the schedule issue BUT take her, she BEST!)

She's great! Always so kind and understanding. She gives great feedback, is easy to contact outside of class and genuinely cares for each student. Cant take her again due to schedule stuff but I 100% would if I was able too.

She's awesome! i took her for ENGL 1101 and 1102 and she really cares about her students. Class is easy just show up and talk a couple times and you'll be fine. She loves her students and is super easy to reach outside class. 10/10 would take again
